name: google-auth-library
description: Google APIs Authentication Client Library for Node.js

0.9.1.name: google-auth-library
0.9.1.description: Google APIs Authentication Client Library for Node.js

scripts.prepare: npm run generate-apis && npm test && npm run lint && npm version patch
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover -x 'apis/**' _mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --timeout 4000 && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

0.10.0.name: google-auth-library
0.10.0.description: Google APIs Authentication Client Library for Node.js

scripts.prepare: npm test && npm run lint && npm version patch
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
